function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerability of essential medical supply chains","Impact":"Inadequate medical supplies during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, stockpiling of essential supplies","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, inventory management systems","People":"Medical staff, patients, public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid shifts in the definition of critical infrastructure","Impact":"Disruption to the identification and prioritization of essential services","Mitigation":"Continuous review and updates to critical infrastructure definitions","Technologies":"Data analytics, monitoring and evaluation tools","People":"Policy makers, government officials","Owner":"Government agencies"},{"Description":"Interconnectedness of critical infrastructure systems","Impact":"Cascade effect of failures across multiple systems","Mitigation":"Enhancing system resilience, establishing redundancies","Technologies":"Interoperable communication systems, system monitoring tools","People":"Critical infrastructure operators, stakeholders","Owner":"Industry regulators, government agencies"}]}
